FuncDef: To configure a virtual routing and forwarding (VRF) instance for Encapsulated Remote Switched Port Analyzer (ERSPAN) traffic forwarding in both the source and destination, use the vrf command. To revert to the defaults, use the no form of this command.
ParentView: network admin network operator configuration mode

ParaDef.Info: Name of the VRF. The VRF name can be any case-sensitive, alphanumeric string up to 32 characters.

ExtraInfo:
This command does not require a license.
Command Default: None
